# Drone News 48h Brief — September 15, 2025

_Window: last 48 hours; 60 incidents._

## Summary
In the past 48 hours, a series of drone incidents have raised significant security concerns across Europe and beyond. Notably, Russian drones have been reported breaching Romanian airspace, prompting condemnation from Romanian officials and NATO. This series of incursions has highlighted a growing tension in Eastern Europe, with calls for enhanced border security measures. Meanwhile, incidents involving drone smuggling by criminal groups in Australia indicate the broadening scope of drone use in illegal activities. Authorities in Poland also scrambled jets in response to potential drone threats related to the ongoing conflict in Ukraine, indicating rising military preparedness in the region. The use of drones in various contexts appears to be escalating, warranting attention from security analysts and policy-makers alike.

**By category:** arrest: 2 • other: 40 • security: 10 • smuggling: 4 • surveillance: 1 • terrorism: 3
**Top queries:** drone incident (32), drone security breach (10), drone crash (4), drone illegal (4), drone terrorism (4)
